unittitle.value: Sean Delonas collection of cartoons from the New York Post

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: This collection consists of 113 original drawings of cartoons by Sean Delonas that were published by the New York Post's Page Six between 1990-2013.

p.value: Photocopying undertaken by staff only. Limited to twenty exposures of stable, unbound material per day.
Gift of the artist, Sean Delonas, March 14, 2015.
Sean Delonas is an American political cartoonist, painter and illustrator. His cartoons were published by the New York Post as part of their Page Six content from 1990-2013.
This collection consists of 113 original drawings of cartoons by Sean Delonas that appeared on Page Six of the New York Post between 1990-2013.
